meanings.definition: To gather together in one place or group.
meanings.sent1: The students assembled in the gym for the school assembly.
meanings.sent2: She assembled all her friends for a surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The toys assembled themselves in a neat line on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The stars assembled in the night sky, creating a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: The ants quickly assembled to carry the food back to their nest.

meanings.definition: To put together parts or pieces to create a whole.
meanings.sent1: He assembled the puzzle with great care.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic assembled the engine in record time.
meanings.sent3: The ingredients assembled perfectly to make a delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: She assembled her thoughts before giving a confident speech.
meanings.sent5: The team assembled a winning strategy for the championship game.
